episodes.name: Will's Home Videos 1: Tanzania
episodes.overview: Go behind the scenes with Will Smith on his wildlife global adventure in Tanzania.

episodes.name: Will's Home Videos 2: Bahamas
episodes.overview: Go behind the scenes with Will Smith as he goes 3,000 feet under the sea.

episodes.name: Will's Home Videos 3: Iceland
episodes.overview: Go behind the scenes with Will Smith as he explores the chilly terrain of Iceland.

episodes.name: Will's Home Videos 4: Vanuatu
episodes.overview: Go behind the scenes with Will Smith as he travels to Vanuatu for one explosive adventure.

episodes.name: Will's Home Videos 5: Namibia
episodes.overview: Go behind the scenes with Will Smith on his transcendent global adventure in Namibia.

episodes.name: The Silent Roar
episodes.overview: On a remote island in the Pacific, Will Smith descends into the heart of an active volcano to investigate sounds beyond human hearing. Will discovers that everything on our planet creates its own unique sound—even if we can’t always hear it.

episodes.name: Descent into Darkness
episodes.overview: In a deep-water submersible, Will Smith descends 3,300 feet to the bottom of the ocean, where even fewer people have gone than outer space. Along the way down, Will and explorer Diva Amon investigate how color is used in the natural world.

episodes.name: Mind of the Swarm
episodes.overview: Thirty years ago, Will Smith was mesmerized by a photo of the incredible wildebeest migration across the Serengeti in a National Geographic magazine. Now he visits those same wildebeests and discovers an amazing survival strategy.

episodes.name: Power of Scent
episodes.overview: On the trail of tiger sharks in the Pacific, Will explores the power of smell. For humans, the sense of smell triggers deep memories and emotions, but it has an even more vital function in the animal world.

episodes.name: Speed of Life
episodes.overview: Will explores the Namibia Desert, where both the landscape and time seem to have stood still for over 50 million years. Will discovers that humans can only see a small sliver of what’s moving around us because everything on the planet is happening either too fast or too slow for us to perceive.

episodes.name: Beyond Fear
episodes.overview: For Will’s final journey, an ultimate challenge. He and polar explorer Dwayne Fields are dropped by helicopter in the middle of an Icelandic glacier.
